title: Laundry facilities, Unfurnished apartments, Bad Credit Ok
posting_body: ['Craig Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Rent by the week or month', '-Large studio apartments', '-Easy freeway access', '-No long term lease required', '-Apartment near Nellis Air Force Base', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-High speed WIFI included', '-Near Las Vegas Speedway', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
